eya pana nathi minihek.budurajanan wahanse wadala, sakkaya dittiya gana dharma deshana karaddi, niwana gana dharma deshana karaddi kenekge hitha me dharmaya kerehi pahadinne nathnam, ee kenage hithata sathutak athi wenne nathnam, me dharmaya aheddi hitha pramuditha wenne nathnam, ‘me dharmaya mamath awabodha karaganna oona’ kiyana adahasin hitha pihitanne nathnam, ee kena ara ganga ayine hitapu penda wage kiyala.pendanwa handunaganna hari lesiyi...budurajanan wahansege dharmaya katha karaddi, ee dharmaya kerehi hitha pahadinne nathi aya handunaganna hari lesiyi.

thrasthawadaya parajaya kirimen hamotama sanipayak danenawa.eyin asanipayak danena kenek innawa nam ee kena inna oone ummaththakagarayaka ehemath nathnam ara rudrakumar kiyana nithignyaya ahase hadapu eelam parlimenthuwa wage thanakane.ehema aya ape rate deshapalana pakshawala hari wenath thanwala hari athayi danagannata labi nathi nisa ada me rate sitina siyalloma thrasthawadaya namathi wisha duma nomathi awakashayaka wathaya sathutin pariharanaya karana aya kiyala kime waradak naha.ee nisa me awakashayata kruthagnyawime yuthukamak me rate wesena hama manushyayakutama, hama satha sipawakutama pamanak noweyi hama gahakata kolayakatamath thiyenawa kiyalayi man hithanne.athhala nohaki bala deshapalana upaya margika thaththwayan nisa ho wenath paudgalika thaththwayan nisa ho thama-thaman thula nirmanaya wana kuhakakama nisa ese kruthagnya wiya nohakima nam aduma tharame akruthagnya nowi sitime yuthukamakwath me polowe payagasa sitina siyallanta thibenawa.ee anuwa me rate deshapalanagnyayan, buddhimathun, kalakaruwan, wruththikayan, siyallatama palamu darusmange me widwath kamitu warthawa mulumaninmath hondinuth kiyawa baliya yuthuya.ehi ek ek parichcheda, wakya pamanak uputa dakwanne nathiwa samasthaya parishilanaya kala wita labenne kumana arthayak da yanna watahagatha yuthuyi.mata nam ehi samudayarthaya washayen watahune eya anatha wu thrasthawadi wyapruthiyakata yali sanatha wime awasthawak saha eyata sujatha bhawayak labadimata yam pirisak gath ikman uthsahayak bawaya.undukapuchchayata noyekuth badakaduththu gihin athiwana apendisayitis thaththwayath samahara wita bhayanaka wenna puluwan.
ee kese wethath api me siddhiya pilibanda awankawama kanagatu wannemu.
